mean_en: something that makes it difficult to do or complete something :something that interferes with movement or progress
sentence: Edward\u0027s speech impediment made it difficult for his classmate to understand him.
sentence_trans: 爱德华的口吃让他的同学很难听懂他在说什么。
word_etyma: impedi阻碍v.+ment名词后缀 → 阻碍，阻碍物
